searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT A.PKID, A.CASE_CODE caseCode, A.ClOSE_TIME, A.CTM_CODE as ctmCode, A.CASE_PROPERTY, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CASE_ORIGIN, B.AGENT_PHONE, B.AGENT_CODE, B.AGENT_NAME, B.RES_DATE dispatchTime, B.GRP_NAME AGENT_ORG_NAME, sd.name status, CASE WHEN ms.pkid is null then 'false' else 'true' end isFocus, CASE WHEN tw.pkid is null then 'false' else 'true' end loanLostAlert, pi.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, su.EMPLOYEE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE A INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO B ON A.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_DICT sd on sd.type='30001' and sd.is_deleted = '0' and a.STATUS = sd.code left join SCTRANS.T_TO_MODULE_SUBSCRIBE ms on ms.module_code = a.case_code and ms.SUBSCRIBER_ID = #userId# left join SCTRANS.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pi on pi.case_code = a.case_code left join sctrans.sys_user su on su.id = B.AGENT_CODE left join sctrans.T_TO_BIZ_WARN tw on tw.case_code = a.case_code and warn_type='LOANLOSS' WHERE <ifNotNull onlyLoanLostAlert> tw.pkid is not null and </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull q_text> ( B.AGENT_NAME like '%' + #q_text# + '%' or pi.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #q_text# + '%' or EXISTS (select 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO tgi where tgi.case_code = a.case_code and tgi.GUEST_NAME like '%' + #q_text# + '%' ) ) and </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull onlyFocus> ms.pkid is not null and </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull property> a.CASE_PROPERTY = #property# and </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull status> a.status = #status# and </ifNotNull> (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.PROCESSOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR G INNER JOIN ( SELECT T.CASE_CODE,T.NEW_ASSIGNEE,S.id FROM SCTRANS.T_TL_TASK_REASSIGNT_LOG T LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON t.ORI_ASSIGNEE = S.username ) L ON L.id = G.PROCESSOR_ID and L.case_code = G.case_code <ifNotNull userLoginName> AND L.NEW_ASSIGNEE = #userLoginName#</ifNotNull> WHERE A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.SRV_CODE IN ( '3000400201', '3000401002' ) ) )
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </ifNotNull> )
<ifNotNull realConTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_SIGN G where A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.REAL_CON_TIME >= #realConTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realConTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_SIGN G where A.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE AND G.REAL_CON_TIME <= #realConTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realHtTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER H where A.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE and H.REAL_HT_TIME >= #realHtTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realHtTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER H where A.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE AND H.REAL_HT_TIME <= #realHtTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realPropertyGetTimeStart> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK I where A.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME >= #realPropertyGetTimeStart#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realPropertyGetTimeEnd> AND EXISTS(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK I where A.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME <= #realPropertyGetTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guestname> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE and GUEST_NAME LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull proName> AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c where c.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE and c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #proName#) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p where p.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE and p.PROCESSOR_ID = #proName#)) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull agentOrgName> AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj where uoj.user_id = A.AGENT_CODE AND uoj.org_id = #agentOrgName# ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode1> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode1#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode2> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode2#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode3> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode3#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode4> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode4#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode5> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode5#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode6> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode6#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode7> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode7#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode8> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode8#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode9> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode9#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode10> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode10#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode11> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode11#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode12> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode12#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode13> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode13#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode14> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode14#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode15> AND EXISTS( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode15#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> AND EXISTS ( select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE J where A.CASE_CODE = J.CASE_CODE and is_active='1' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signDateStart> AND J.SIGN_DATE >= #signDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signDateEnd> and J.SIGN_DATE <= #signDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendDateStart> and J.LEND_DATE >= #lendDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendDateEnd> and J.LEND_DATE <= #lendDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> ) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull yuCuiOriGrpId> AND EXISTS ( SELECT F.CASE_CODE,F.ORG_ID FROM (SELECT C.CASE_CODE,C.ORG_ID FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE UNION SELECT P.CASE_CODE,P.ORG_ID FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR P WHERE P.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE ) F INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG AS YCORG ON F.ORG_ID = YCORG.ID WHERE (YCORG.ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId# OR YCORG.PARENT_ID = #yuCuiOriGrpId#) ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull isNotResearchCloseCase> AND A.CASE_PROPERTY != '30003002' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull caseOriginType> AND A.CASE_ORIGIN = #caseOriginType# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTime> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW w LEFT JOIN sctrans.act_hi_varinst v ON v.PROC_INST_ID_ = w.INST_CODE AND v.name_ = 'GuohuApprove' AND v.long_ = 1 LEFT JOIN ( select proc_inst_id_,end_time_ from ( select proc_inst_id_,assignee_,end_time_,row_number() over(partition by proc_inst_id_ order by end_time_ desc) rn from sctrans.act_hi_taskinst WHERE task_def_key_ = 'GuohuApprove' ) taskInst where taskInst.rn <= 1 ) t ON t.proc_inst_id_ = w.inst_code WHERE A.CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND w.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND w.STATUS IN ('0', '4') AND w.PKID = (select max(PKID) from sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW WHERE CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND STATUS IN ('0', '4')) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTimeStart> AND t.end_time_ >= #guohuApproveTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTimeEnd> AND t.end_time_ <= #guohuApproveTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTime> ) </ifNotNull>

select tc.CASE_CODE caseCode, sd.name status,LEADING_PROCESS_ID leadingProcessId,pi.PROPERTY_ADDR addr, CASE WHEN ms.pkid is null then 'false' else 'true' end isFocus, ti.AGENT_CODE,ti.AGENT_PHONE,ti.AGENT_NAME,su.EMPLOYEE_CODE, CASE WHEN tw.pkid is null then 'false' else 'true' end loanLostAlert, so.org_name org ,tc.ORG_ID orgId from sctrans.T_TO_CASE tc LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_DICT sd on sd.type='30001' and sd.is_deleted = '0' and tc.STATUS = sd.code left join SCTRANS.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pi on pi.case_code = tc.case_code left join SCTRANS.T_TO_MODULE_SUBSCRIBE ms on ms.module_code = tc.case_code and ms.SUBSCRIBER_ID = #userId# left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ti on ti.CASE_CODE = tc.case_code left join sctrans.sys_user su on su.id = ti.AGENT_CODE left join sctrans.sys_org so on su.org_id = so.id left join sctrans.T_TO_BIZ_WARN tw on tw.case_code = tc.case_code and warn_type='LOANLOSS' where tc.case_code = #caseCode#

select sd.name refundType, sd2.NAME mortType, tm.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT totalAmount,tm.COM_AMOUNT comAmount, tm.COM_YEAR comYear,tm.COM_DISCOUNT comDiscount,tm.PRF_AMOUNT psfAmount, tm.PRF_YEAR psfYear,sd3.name status, tm.LOANER_NAME loanerName,tm.LOANER_PHONE loanerPhone,fo.FIN_ORG_NAME loanerOrg from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE tm left join sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG fo on fo.FIN_ORG_CODE = tm.LOANER_ORG_CODE left join sctrans.SYS_DICT sd on sd.CODE = tm.LEND_WAY and sd.TYPE = '30017' left join sctrans.SYS_DICT sd2 on sd2.CODE = tm.MORT_TYPE and sd2.TYPE = '30016' left join sctrans.SYS_DICT sd3 on sd3.CODE = tm.STATE_IN_BANK and sd3.TYPE = 'part_code' where tm.case_code = #caseCode# and IS_ACTIVE = 1

select CON_PRICE conPrice, HOLD_YEAR year, IS_UNIQUE_HOME isUniqueHome, HOUSE_PROPERTY houseProperty, AMOUNT1 firstPay,
AMOUNT2 secondPay, AMOUNT3 thirdPay, AMOUNT4 forthPay, HOUSE_HODING_TAX fangchanTax, CONTRACT_TAX qishuiTax,
BUSINESS_TAX yingyeTax, LAND_INCREMENT_TAX tudiTax, PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX gerenTax from sctrans.V_CASE_TRADE_INFO_VIEW where CASE_CODE = #caseCode#

select su.REAL_NAME name,su.MOBILE moblie,su.EMPLOYEE_CODE employeeCode, so.ORG_NAME org from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR tp inner join sctrans.SYS_USER su on su.ID = tp.PROCESSOR_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG so on so.ID = su.ORG_ID where tp.SRV_CODE = '3000401002' and tp.CASE_CODE = #caseCode#
